description.content: Add loading animation when entering and exiting page

details.content:
Add loading animation when entering and exiting page

### Entering
- Home: Load from side
- About/Help: None
- Everything else: circle load and then appear from bottoms

### Exiting
- Everything: Fade upwards

description.content: Add tasks to board to practice!

details.content:
Modify front end to remove hard string and store in json file.
Look at [this](https://blog.knoldus.com/diversifying-angular-app-multi-lingual-support/#:~:text=Angular%20supports%20multi%2Dlanguages%20natively,different%20languages%20for%20different%20locales.) to help.

description.content: Add spotify verification and keep token for a certain duration.

details.content:
Add spotify verification and keep token for a certain duration.

Here are some links that are useful:
Client Auth
- https://developer.spotify.com/documentation/general/guides/authorization/implicit-grant/
- https://github.com/spotify/web-api-examples/tree/master/authentication/implicit_grant

Server Auth
- https://developer.spotify.com/documentation/general/guides/authorization/client-credentials/
- https://developer.spotify.com/documentation/general/guides/authorization/use-access-token/
- https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=1vR3m0HupGI
Add a welcome message and nice ui.

description.content: Create a navbar component to traverse between home, about and help.

details.content:
NavBar component should be a modal that pops over from the right and should include three buttons (home, anout, help). At the bottom there should be a link to BuyMeACoffee.
- Home: Takes you back to the home page where you begin the process of starting a playlist
- About: Takes you to about page that describes what is and purpose of tool
- Help: Takes to page to describe how to use the tool.
